name: long
author: Daniel Wirtz <dcode@dcode.io>
description: A Long class for representing a 64-bit two's-complement integer value.

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:typescript
scripts.test:typescript: tsc --project tests/typescript/tsconfig.esnext.json && tsc --project tests/typescript/tsconfig.nodenext.json && tsc --project tests/typescript/tsconfig.commonjs.json
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:typescript
scripts.test:typescript: tsc --project tests/typescript/tsconfig.esnext.json && tsc --project tests/typescript/tsconfig.nodenext.json && tsc --project tests/typescript/tsconfig.commonjs.json && tsc --project tests/typescript/tsconfig.global.json
